summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5396 for the improvement of Graham Street, from Empire Way to Beacon Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 66704, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
